DESCRIPTION: Award-winning fine dining featuring contemporary American cuisine with French influences
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: The Golden Spoon represents the pinnacle of fine dining in San Francisco. Executive Chef Marcus Beaumont brings 20 years of Michelin-starred experience to create innovative dishes that celebrate seasonal ingredients and culinary artistry. Our intimate dining room provides the perfect setting for special occasions and memorable evenings.
